description:
As much as it impossible this can sound, the best way to prevent diseases such as Ebola is to prevent poverty. 
Poverty leads to unclean water and numerous hygine problems, and that plays a big factor in the cause of deadly diseases.

Poverty is the biggest factor in disease outbreak.  The limited access to proper sanitataion in some third countries causes the virus to spread rapidly.  Also, the lack of healthcare to infected patience puts danger in the whole community in the area. Proverty is the reason people lack the necessary supplies to protect themselves from the disease. One of the best way to solve this Ebola sitatuon is to provide the third-world countries proper supplies, clean water, and a better healthcare.
summary: Poverty plays a big role in the cause of deadly diseases.
title: Ebola : solution to reduce the spread of Ebola
